bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: kfctl build fails no name found - fatal: No names found, cannot describe anything.
bug.description:
kfctl build is failing in presubmit. <denchmark-link:https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_kubeflow/3515/kubeflow-presubmit/1144085830764072962/>https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_kubeflow/3515/kubeflow-presubmit/1144085830764072962/</denchmark-link>
error is <denchmark-code>https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_kubeflow/3515/kubeflow-presubmit/1144085830764072962/ </denchmark-code>
I can't reproduce locally running <denchmark-code> make build-kfctl </denchmark-code>
which is what the presubmit is doing. My theory is its coming from here:
kubeflow/bootstrap/Makefile
Line 22 in a828e7d
TAG ?= $(eval TAG := $(shell git describe --tags --long))$(TAG)

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.93. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Looks like this a red herring. It doesn't get a tag but this doesn't appear to cause make to abort. <denchmark-code>util.py 71 INFO go build -i -gcflags 'all=-N -l' -ldflags "-X main.VERSION=" -o bin/kfctl cmd/kfctl/main.go util.py 45 INFO Running: /mnt/test-data-volume/kubeflow-presubmit-kfctl-go-iap-istio-3515-83467d3-2962-3f57/src/kubeflow/kubeflow/ bootstrap/bin/kfctl init /mnt/test-data-volume/kubeflow-presubmit-kfctl-go-iap-istio-3515-83467d3-2962-3f57/kfctl-3f57 -V --platform=gcp --version=pull/35 15 --package-manager=kustomize@0caa70b4518859c0678d0d0e12c11a7e35345c5a --skip-init-gcp-project --disable_usage_report --project=kubeflow-ci-deployment -- use_istio cwd=/mnt/test-data-volume/kubeflow-presubmit-kfctl-go-iap-istio-3515-83467d3-2962-3f57 </denchmark-code>
We can see that it ends up setting version to the empty string and then continuing to invoke kfctl.
